Module rrpss
Package menu

Class PromotionPackage

java.lang.Object
menu.PromotionPackage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrderPromotionPackage
public class PromotionPackage extends Object implements Serializable
A promotion package contains two or more menu items, packaged together in a deal. Customers may order this instead of the ala carte items it contains for a cheaper price
Author:
yes
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public PromotionPackage​(int packageId, String packageName, double packagePrice, String packageDescription, ArrayList<MenuItem> listOfMenuItem)
      This creates a promotion package, containing a list of ala carte menu items
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the package
      packageName - The name of the package
      packagePrice - The price of the package
      packageDescription - The description of the package
      listOfMenuItem - The list of ala carte menu items contained in the promotion package
